verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> O God תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י <WH8416> of my praise אַֽל־ <WH408> not תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ <WH2790> Hold not thy peace

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for פִ֪י <WH6310> For the mouth רָשָׁ֡ע <WH7563> of the wicked וּֽפִי־ <WH6310> and the mouth מִ֭רְמָה <WH4820> of the deceitful עָלַ֣י <WH5921> against פָּתָ֑חוּ <WH6605> are opened דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> against me they have spoken אִ֝תִּ֗י <WH854> against לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> against me with a lying
וְדִבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> me about also with words שִׂנְאָ֣ה <WH8135> of hatred סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> They compassed וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי <WH3898> and fought חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> against me without a cause
תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> return אַהֲבָתִ֥י <WH160> For my love יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <WH7853> they are my adversaries וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I תְפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> but I [give myself unto] prayer

וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> And they have rewarded עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and רָ֭עָה <WH7451> me evil תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> for good וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה <WH8135> and hatred תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ <WH160> for my love

הַפְקֵ֣ד <WH6485> Set עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> over רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> thou a wicked man וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן <WH7854> over him and let Satan יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> stand עַל־ <WH5921> over יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> at his right hand

בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ <WH8199> When he shall be judged יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> let him be רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> condemned וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8605> and let his prayer תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ <WH2401> become sin
יִֽהְיֽוּ־ <WH1961> Let יָמָ֥יו <WH3117> Let his days מְעַטִּ֑ים <WH4592> be few פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ <WH6486> his office יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> take אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> [and] let another
יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> Let בָנָ֥יו <WH1121> Let his children יְתוֹמִ֑ים <WH3490> be fatherless וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ <WH802> and his wife אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> a widow

וְנ֤וֹעַ <WH5128> be continually יָנ֣וּעוּ <WH5128> vagabonds בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> Let his children וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ <WH7592> and beg וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ <WH1875> let them seek מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2723> [their bread] also out of their desolate places

יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH5367> catch נ֭וֹשֶׁה <WH5383> Let the extortioner לְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֑וֹ וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ <WH962> spoil זָרִ֣ים <WH2114> all that he hath and let the strangers יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ <WH3018> his labour אַל־ <WH408> nay יְהִי־ <WH1961> become

ל֭וֹ מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> Let there be none to extend חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> mercy וְֽאַל־ <WH408> Let there be none יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן <WH2603> unto him neither let there be any to favour לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ <WH3490> his fatherless children

יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> Let אַחֲרִית֥וֹ <WH319> Let his posterity לְהַכְרִ֑ית <WH3772> be cut off בְּד֥וֹר <WH1755> [and] in the generation אַ֝חֵ֗ר <WH312> following יִמַּ֥ח <WH4229> be blotted out שְׁמָֽם׃ <WH8034> let their name

יִזָּכֵ֤ר ׀ <WH2142> be remembered עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> Let the iniquity אֲ֭בֹתָיו <WH1> of his fathers אֶל־ <WH413> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> with the LORD וְחַטַּ֥את <WH2403> and let not the sin אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <WH517> of his mother אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּמָּֽח׃ <WH4229> be blotted out

יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> Let נֶֽגֶד־ <WH5048> them be before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Let them be before the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> continually וְיַכְרֵ֖ת <WH3772> that he may cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <WH2143> the memory

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <WH834> after לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not זָכַר֮ <WH2142> Because that he remembered עֲשׂ֪וֹת <WH6213> not to shew חָ֥סֶד <WH2617> mercy וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף <WH7291> but persecuted אִישׁ־ <WH376> man עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the poor וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן <WH34> and needy וְנִכְאֵ֨ה <WH5218> broken לֵבָ֬ב <WH3824> in heart לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ <WH4191> that he might even slay

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב <WH157> As he loved קְ֭לָלָה <WH7045> cursing וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ <WH935> so let it come וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> did not חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> unto him as he delighted בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> not in blessing וַתִּרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> so let it be far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <WH3847> As he clothed קְלָלָ֗ה <WH7045> himself with cursing כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ <WH4055> like as with his garment וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> so let it come כַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> like water בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> into his bowels וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> and like oil בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6106> into his bones

תְּהִי־ <WH1961> become ל֭וֹ כְּבֶ֣גֶד <WH899> Let it be unto him as the garment יַעְטֶ֑ה <WH5844> [which] covereth וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח <WH4206> him and for a girdle תָּמִ֥יד <WH8548> continually יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ <WH2296> wherewith he is girded

זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <WH6468> [Let] this [be] the reward שֹׂ֭טְנַי <WH7853> of mine adversaries מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> from the LORD וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים <WH1696> and of them that speak רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> evil עַל־ <WH5921> against נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> against my soul

וְאַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> O יְה֘וִ֤ה <WH3069> thou for me O GOD אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord עֲ‍ֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> But do אִ֭תִּי <WH854> for לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> for thy name's כִּי־ <WH3588> Because ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [is] good חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> sake because thy mercy הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <WH5337> deliver
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עָנִ֣י <WH6041> For I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> and needy אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> and my וְ֝לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> and my heart חָלַ֥ל <WH2490> is wounded בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <WH7130> within
כְּצֵל־ <WH6738> like the shadow כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ <WH5186> when it declineth נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> I am gone נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי <WH5287> I am tossed up and down כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH697> as the locust
בִּ֭רְכַּי <WH1290> My knees כָּשְׁל֣וּ <WH3782> are weak מִצּ֑וֹם <WH6685> through fasting וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> and my flesh כָּחַ֥שׁ <WH3584> faileth מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of fatness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> have become חֶרְפָּ֣ה <WH2781> I became also a reproach לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> they יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי <WH7200> unto them [when] they looked יְנִיע֥וּן <WH5128> upon me they shaked רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> their heads
עָ֭זְרֵנִי <WH5826> Help יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> O save כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> me according to thy mercy

וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ <WH3045> That they may know כִּי־ <WH3588> for יָ֣דְךָ <WH3027> that this [is] thy hand זֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [that] thou LORD עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ <WH6213> hast done

יְקַֽלְלוּ־ <WH7043> Let them curse הֵמָּה֮ <WH1992> like וְאַתָּ֪ה <WH859> You תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> but bless קָ֤מוּ ׀ <WH6965> thou when they arise וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ <WH954> let them be ashamed וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> but let thy servant יִשְׂמָֽח׃ <WH8055> rejoice

יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <WH3847> be clothed שׂוֹטְנַ֣י <WH7853> Let mine adversaries כְּלִמָּ֑ה <WH3639> with shame וְיַעֲט֖וּ <WH5844> and let them cover כַמְעִ֣יל <WH4598> as with a mantle בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <WH1322> themselves with their own confusion

א֘וֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> I will greatly בְּפִ֑י <WH6310> with my mouth וּבְת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> him among רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> the multitude אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH1984> yea I will praise

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַ֭עֲמֹד <WH5975> For he shall stand לִימִ֣ין <WH3225> at the right hand אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> of the poor לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> to save מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י <WH8199> [him] from those that condemn נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> his soul
